data.title: Salzburg Hbf → Bernau (b Berlin) by Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Salzburg Hbf to Bernau (b Berlin) in 6h 30m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Salzburg Hbf to Bernau (b Berlin) today.
data.text:
Looking to travel from Salzburg Hbf to Bernau (b Berlin) by train? You've come to the right place!

On average, it takes around 7 hours 46 minutes to travel from Salzburg Hbf to Bernau (b Berlin) by train, the fastest services can get you there in as little as 6 hours 30 minutes though. You'll usually find 15 trains per day running along the 337 miles (542 km) route between these two destinations. You’ll need to make 2 changes during the journey to Bernau (b Berlin), as there currently aren't any direct services on this route. You'll be travelling with ICE, DB or ÖBB on your way to Bernau (b Berlin), as these are the main rail operators on this route.

Plan your trip ahead and book your train tickets in advance if you want to snap up the cheapest fares. Just start a search in our Journey Planner to view the latest prices for trains from Salzburg Hbf to Bernau (b Berlin).

If you’re feeling ready to book, start looking for cheap train tickets with us today. Keep reading for more information on the journey to Bernau (b Berlin) by train, including our timetable where you can view first and last train times.
